mapper.insert: insert into app_menu (id, p_id, app_id, menu_name, menu_type, menu_key, url, page_path, app_id_des, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appIdDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_menu set p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_key = #{menuKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_path = #{pagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id_des = #{appIdDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, p_id, app_id, menu_name, menu_type, menu_key, url, page_path, app_id_des, content from app_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, p_id, app_id, menu_name, menu_type, menu_key, url, page_path, app_id_des, content from app_menu
